markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 13"
    pfs=""
>
[Blightburn Ward](/Equipment.aspx?ID=653)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #155: Lord of the Black Sands](/Sources.aspx?ID=33) pg. 73</row>

**Price** 2,300 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn necklace

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This heavy iron necklace is decorated with tiny gems that resemble the stars in the ceiling high above the Vault of the Black Desert. While you have invested this item, you cannot contract blightburn sickness. It doesn't cure [blightburn sickness](/Diseases.aspx?ID=21) if you already have it, but the disease's stage can't progress while you wear it.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Blightburn Ward
